That's a great idea! Google Calendar is a fantastic tool for keeping track of upcoming events and reminders. By setting reminders for birthdays, baby showers, and other celebrations, you'll be able to plan ahead, budget for gifts, and show your loved ones that you care.

Including notes about gift ideas and budgeting in the reminders is a brilliant move. This will help you stay organized and ensure that you don't forget important details. You can even use the notes section to:

* Jot down gift ideas as they come to you
* Set a budget for the gift
* Keep track of any gift-giving traditions or preferences
* Remind yourself to send a card or make a phone call

By having all this information in one place, you'll be able to stay on top of your gift-giving and make it a more enjoyable experience.

Some additional tips to get the most out of Google Calendar:

* Use different colors or labels to categorize your events (e.g., birthdays, baby showers, holidays)
* Set reminders for multiple days in advance to give yourself plenty of time to prepare
* Consider setting recurring events for annual birthdays and other regular celebrations
* Share your calendar with family members or friends to keep them informed about upcoming events

By using Google Calendar to stay organized, you'll be able to focus on what really matters – celebrating and showing your love and appreciation for your friends and family!
